name: People's reform Association for Better and Advance Livelihoods (PRABAL) Society
briefDescription: PRABAL works for various group of target groups like old age persons, women, children etc. We have focus on water-sanitation, miro-credit, vocational training, education etc. We are working with 07 permanent  employees and few part-time staff as per the need. We have a group of volunteers which rendered their support time to time as per the programme's demand. Our organisation is working extensively under National Rural Drinking Water Programme in may district of Rajasthan.
